subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Trevor Ariza scored the go-ahead basket on a fast-break layup with 1 minute 20 seconds left in the third overtime, and the Washington Wizards outlasted the Raptors.
snippet: Trevor Ariza scored the go-ahead basket on a fast-break layup with 1 minute 20 seconds left in the third overtime, and the Washington Wizards outlasted the Raptors.
